item.description:
Paul had a good idea, we can meet at Breakheart Pond and hike around it.
Get to route 165 in Rhode Island, then go north on Frosty Hollow Road
(dirt road, small church on the corner), then turn right at the
intersection with the sign. After that there is a fork in the road, go
left. There is a parking lot at the south end of the pond next to the
waterfall.
item.how_to_find_us: we can meet at the pond parking lot

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Hiking Day at Arcadia Park
